transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Good morning, this is Samantha Brooks from Summit Collections calling for Richard. Is he available?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hi Richard, thank you for taking my call. I'm reaching out about your account that shows a balance of $1,450. I wanted to touch base and see if we could work together to resolve this.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I was planning to pay it next week when I get my bonus check.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: That's great to hear! Would you like me to note that in your account so you don't receive any additional calls before then? When exactly do you expect to receive your bonus?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: It should be deposited by the 20th.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Perfect. I'll put a hold on your account until the 20th. Would you be paying the full balance or would you prefer to set up a payment arrangement?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Excellent! I really appreciate you being proactive about this. I'll send you a payment confirmation email with our payment portal link. If for any reason the bonus doesn't come through, just give us a call and we'll work out an alternative plan. Sound good?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Yes, thank you for being so helpful.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: My pleasure, Richard. Have a wonderful day!
